title: Error Code 003
body:
Riot fix pls :D

lots of people have it, as of 9:09pm NZT

UPDATE: Got into a normal game at 9:35pm NZT

replies.body:
Hi Everyone, thanks for your reports and patience with this. We are investigating and you can follow along [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/3B6pJzzp-live-issue-oct-2nd-unable-to-login-error-code-003).
No updates as of yet but we've got multiple teams on the case.
I feel I should add, that just relogging in can temporarily fix the problem. It seems to be a problem more with the client thinking there is a problem.
I've just managed to log in - whatever they are doing, its working!
game just started patching (i tried a fresh re-install and the game wouldnt patch) so i assume its fixed?
(In Australia) Had the same problem for an hour or so, but I just managed to log into the client after it did a patch or something. Haven't tried playing a match yet, but I think it would work.
Same problem here, def not offline.
Im spewing. Came home hoping to play a few games. Till that same message popped up. Sac reacs only. Please fix soon riot.
Dude same been at work all day and then i thought it was just my pc but kinda glad to see its not just me feels bad man{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

literally all my friends are getting this, please fix! we really just wanna 5 man

please fix this, we just wanna play some league :(
RITOPLS

Yup, I have this too! Server status says everything is fine, but I'm definitely not offline so it doesn't look like it's on my end.

I'm with iinet in Sydney, so it's not a NZ only issue.

> [{quoted}](name=loathey,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Wt5NIYGM,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-10-02T08:14:01.555+0000)
>
> Yup, I have this too! Server status says everything is fine, but I'm definitely not offline so it doesn't look like it's on my end.
> 
> I'm with iinet in Sydney, so it's not a NZ only issue.

You know OCE covers NZ and AU hey...

> [{quoted}](name=Keitaro chan,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Wt5NIYGM,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-10-02T08:23:23.154+0000)
>
> You know OCE covers NZ and AU hey...

ye, last time NZ players either was experiencing 200 ping or cannot log in, when AU was fine
Yes, that's why I confirmed it wasn't just an issue in NZ. Sometimes the issues are regional or with a certain internet provider.
Yeah same here. I made a post on the NA forums, hoping to gain attention from a Rioter.
i'm starting to have it now. 1800 gold coast
Yes I'm glad that I am not the only one with this problem

Can confirm same symptoms as others, have tested the following:
Windows update - am up to date
Hextech repair tool and force patching no luck
Deleting contents of highest number folder within 'releases' folder 
Restarting computer and running league client as admin
yes same, im in a net cafe. people logged in  can still queue and play, but nobody can log in

The issue is stopping players from playing League of Legends! It just comes up to everyone. Not too sure if it's in other regions besides OCE. 
Please help this issue right away.
Yep, I was able to login guys. Give it a try now, should be working. Best of luck out there on the rift!
Riot looks to be aware of the issue - as per the server status now. https://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

dont worry guys!
they are working on a fix
Doesn't let me log in to client now as well.
12:38:AM Nz time and still not able to login Rito plz :({{item:3070}}
If anyones still receiving this issue try restarting your client/computer, I just tried the client again and have logged in successfully and it's patching :D
We're working on the problem, they wouldn't have to if there was no problem to start with hahaha
same here. just tried to re-install and it wont even attempt to download the patches... waste of time that was..
Typical Riot!! lol

They are on it guys! Check the server status now!

I actually got kicked off mid-game, so was already logged in.
Luckily we had just finished!
reeee
pls rito
